divs: Sighting DetailsLooking at the skye and noticed multiple red dots in the sky moving in sink to form a rectangle into a triangle, into one single dot and then disappeared. I know It wasnt a plane this is definitely a smart out of the world object. Ive seen videos of it before and thought it was bullshit but now Im a believer cause I saw it with my own eyes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bryn Mawr
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Red dots moving from triangle to single dot
